pullrequest.title: Polaris: raise steering wheel, add collision shapes for roll cage and handles

content.raw:
Not sure whether those issues are intended for this pull-request given that it's experimental, or whether the features are left out, but:

* button interface is missing - esp. F/N/R switch (I'd also like a mode switch to secretly switch to the 40kph mode while no one is looking! ;) )
* there's two hand brakes - which position will be the one used for VRC?
* no keyswitch - will we need to use it or will this only be a requirement for DRC?
* completely black steering wheel - it works better than I expected it would but a proper non-constant-black texture would be preferred. Please use the previous visual steering wheel (or its texture) if possible.
content.html:
Not sure whether those issues are intended for this pull-request given that it's experimental, or whether the features are left out, but:

  • button interface is missing - esp. F/N/R switch (I'd also like a mode switch to secretly switch to the 40kph mode while no one is looking! ;) )
  • there's two hand brakes - which position will be the one used for VRC?
  • no keyswitch - will we need to use it or will this only be a requirement for DRC?
  • completely black steering wheel - it works better than I expected it would but a proper non-constant-black texture would be preferred. Please use the previous visual steering wheel (or its texture) if possible.
